location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.374 of 1820 from James Farish, Secretary to Government, to James Dow, in charge of the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter relates to the payment of British troops in the Persian Gulf. Farish acknowledges receipt of previous correspondence from Dow, stating that the Honourable Governor in Council approves of Dow's raising 50,000 rupees for the payment of British troops at Kishma [Qeshm].
